meanings.sent1: The chimaeric creature in the story had wings like a bird and scales like a fish.
meanings.sent2: Her chimaeric dreams of flying to the moon were filled with wonder and magic.
meanings.sent3: The chimaeric idea of a talking cat made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: His chimaeric plan to build a house made of candy was as unrealistic as it was sweet.
meanings.sent5: The chimaeric world of the young girl's imagination was a place of endless possibilities.

meanings.definition: Composed of different parts or elements
meanings.sent1: The chimaeric painting combined bright colors with dark shadows in a unique way.
meanings.sent2: The chimaeric sculpture was a mix of marble, wood, and metal, creating a stunning piece of art.
meanings.sent3: The chimaeric car made from parts of various vehicles turned heads on the street.
meanings.sent4: Her chimaeric outfit of mismatched patterns and colors was surprisingly fashionable.
meanings.sent5: The chimaeric building stood out with its blend of modern and traditional architectural styles.

meanings.sent1: The chimaeric menu offered a wide range of dishes from different cuisines.
meanings.sent2: The chimaeric garden bloomed with flowers of all colors, shapes, and sizes.
meanings.sent3: The chimaeric group of friends included people from various backgrounds and interests.
meanings.sent4: Her chimaeric collection of stamps featured designs from countries around the world.
meanings.sent5: The chimaeric music festival showcased artists from diverse genres and cultures.
